Class Coffee

java.lang.Object
  Product
      Coffee

public class Coffee
extends Product

This class models a coffee product. It extends Product and adds the following information:

  1. the origin of the coffee, a String
  2. the roast of the coffee, a String
  3. the flavor of the coffee, a String
  4. the aroma of the coffee, a String
  5. the acidity of the coffee, a String
  6. the body of the product, a double

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Product

Constructs a Coffee object.

Parameters:
initialCode - the code of the product.
initialDescription - a short description of the product.
initialPrice - the price of the product.
initialOrigin - the origin of coffee.
initialRoast - the kind of roast of the coffee.
initialFlavor - the flavor of the coffee.
initialAroma - the aroma of the coffee.
initialAcidity - the acidity of the coffee.
initialBody - the body of the coffee.
